Reviews.Title: Had to exchange
Reviews.Author: Karen V Perrino
Reviews.Content: I don't hate this phone; it was the wrong one.  It has been exchanged for a Verizon compatible version, and I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: mariluz mendoza
Reviews.Content: the cellphone got to Venezuela in good conditions and it really satisfied the buyer expectations because of the good quality of the the product.

Reviews.Title: Muy bueno
Reviews.Author: vanessa meriño
Reviews.Content: Muy bueno fabulosa me encanto en muy buen estado,fabulosa me encanto en muy buen estado,fabulosa me encanto en muy buen estado

Reviews.Title: do not buy this phone!!
Reviews.Author: festival1100
Reviews.Content: Ordered this phone as a replacement. Ordered a "new" one and received a rebuilt one. Went to activate on Verizon, comes up as Blackberry Violet,when in fact the device is black. No Verizon branding on the frontBack cover does not match, touchpad is a replacement and sticks. Afraid to see what the device might not do if activated. I wiped the phone and will be returning it for a refund.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fast 3G connectivity; BlackBerry OS 5.0; Support for BlackBerry App World; Mac compatibility with BlackBerry Desktop Software for Mac
Brightly colorful 2.6-inch LCD screen; 35-key backlit full QWERTY keyboard; Innovative touch-sensitive optical trackpad
GPS using Sprint Navigation; 2-megapixel camera; Video capture capabilities
Advanced media player for music, pictures and videos; Dedicated media keys smoothly integrated along the top of the handset
Bluetooth 2.1 connectivity with stereo music streaming (A2DP) capabilities; Wi-Fi networking (802.11b/g); Memory expansion via microSD card slot
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Curve 8530 Sprint CDMA Cell Phone with 3G, OS 5.0, 2MP Camera, QWERTY Keyboard, GPS and Wi-Fi - Black
